function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges in contact tracing process, including identification, privacy violation, and monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical addresses, street names, and identification cards for contact-persons.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased exposure of contact tracing personnel to covid-19 and potential stigmatization.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Analysis of people’s migration patterns leading to privacy concerns and ethical implications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of contact tracing data for unethical purposes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on technology for covid-19 detection and monitoring","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of ai technologies due to lack of data for tracking and prediction of covid-19 cases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of rt-pcr test kits leading to delays in covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate and unreliable ai forecasting models due to noisy and limited data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Search string focusing on contagious diseases could lead to biased results and miss important studies related to other diseases or areas of research.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of nonpeer-reviewed articles and studies in other languages with no english translation might lead to language and publication bias.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai algorithms for quality assessment may overlook important nuances and context in the evaluation of research articles.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High-risk patients identification","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 hotspot mapping","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate real-time case surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited information on how covid-19 spreads in asymptomatic individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in reliable information on covid-19 transmission between countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of covid-19 testing kits and detection tools","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quarantine-induced reduction in physical activity energy expenditure","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of stay-at-home on physical and mental health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Demographic breakdown of study participants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mental health impacts of lack of access to exercise and physical activity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Over-reporting bias of physical activity in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worsening of psychophysical conditions due to pandemic-induced restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of physical activity levels linked to worse psychological well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender disparity in the correlation between physical activity reduction and psychological well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased physical activity energy expenditure during quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender differences in exercise habits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low physical activity levels among italian adults, especially during covid-19 quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in performing intense exercise at home compared to moderate activity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of maintaining physical activity levels during quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worldwide spread of sars-cov-2 leading to containment measures and quarantine","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited sample size for the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of national health monitoring and surveillance system for physical activity in italy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction of physical activity linked with worse psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender differences in the correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Age differences in the association between physical activity and psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in physical activity levels during covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased housework activities leading to unexpected physical activity levels in certain population groups.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Significant decrease in physical activity among different gender and age groups during quarantine.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in physical activity behavior compared to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Percentage increase in low active individuals during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participants of the study classified into different groups of physical activity may have different levels of exposure to contagious diseases based on their activity levels.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Subjective perception of well-being during covid-19 emergency may reflect the psychological impact of the pandemic on the participants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of statistical analysis software may introduce errors in data interpretation and reporting.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible transmission of covid-19 through the completion of an online questionnaire.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate data due to invalid questionnaire responses or unwillingness of participants to provide valid information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
